title: Single Of The Week: Hudson Mohawke – Thunder Bay
body:
[![](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/06/WAP313Packshot.jpg "WAP313Packshot")](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/8392-single-of-the-week-hudson-mohawke-thunder-bay/attachment/wap313packshot)

It’s been a while, but the Scotland based beat-maker **Hudson Mohawke** is back with a new EP entitled, _Satin Panthers,_ which is due to be released on Warp on August 2. He’s also dropped a new tune, _Thunder Bay_, which is a rave inspired, squelch fest of bass; if one was to describe it like a cunt, which one very much is. Check it out below.
